text: A Mother's Devotion () is a 1966 Soviet drama movie directed by Mark Donskoy.Родион Нахапетов отметил 75-летие в Москве с мечтами о новых фильмахВЕРНОСТЬ МАТЕРИ It stars Nina Menshikova, Rodion Nakhapetov, and Gennadi Chertov. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1966 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Donskoy
title: A Mother's Devotion
